en-US.summary: Find out if you are on Santa's naughty or nice list
en-US.name: santa's little helper
en-US.description: Every Christmas Santa makes his naughty and nice list. Santa's little helper will help you to find out which list you are on. If you are really lucky Santa himself might speak to you also. If you are feeling full of Christmas cheer and you like this skill please leave it a 5 start review. Merry Christmas!

publishingInformation.testingInstructions: Launch the skill and when prompted tell the skill your first name, and then ask if you are naughty or nice.
